head.supplied: ¶ [The Secretary read a letter from Dr. ¶ Mueller ¶ , of Victoria, expressing his willingness to co-operate with, and assist the Society. From his position in connection with the Botanical Gardens i...

div.p: To the Westland Naturalists and Acclimatization Society

Letter not found. The text given here is from a report of the meeting of the Society held on 2 October 1868, in West coast times (Hokitaka, NZ), 3 October 1868, p. 3. It is dated to September as the latest likely date that it could have been written to be reported at the meeting.
[The Secretary read a letter from Dr. Mueller, of Victoria, expressing his willingness to co-operate with, and assist the Society. From his position in connection with the Botanical Gardens in Melbourne this is satisfactory.]
